titleInfo.title: Letter No. 22 to William Digges Latouche and George Abraham, Factors at Bussora [Basra], from John Beaumont at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: A slim portion of text is missing on the right-hand side of Page 15.

mods.abstract: The letter discusses financial issues and refers to piastres and Venice Ware deposited by Coja Evra. The arrival of the AssistanceSnow and Captain John Johnston is reported. The letter also reports rumours of the death of Carem Cahn [Karim Khan] and that his eldest son has succeeded him. The letter also reports news that Shaikh Rashed is willing to return a captured English vessel for a fee. Shipped by Jumma Caracky Express
